name: thousand-arrows
caption: Thousand Arrows

effect.short: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Grounds the target until it leaves battle.  Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of []{type:flying}-type Pokémon.

flavorText:
This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in
the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to
the ground.
